name: Developer Roadmap Plugin
description: Comprehensive learning platform with 75+ developer roadmaps covering 7 specialized domains. Interactive agents guide developers through structured learning paths from beginner to advanced levels.
author: Roadmap Team

agents.name: AI & Machine Learning Specialist
agents.description: Expert in AI engineering, machine learning, data science, MLOps, prompt engineering, AI agents, and red teaming

agents.name: Frontend & Web Technologies Expert
agents.description: Specialist in web development, frameworks, mobile development, APIs, and web technologies

agents.name: Backend & Database Specialist
agents.description: Expert in backend development, programming languages, databases, data engineering, and system design

agents.name: DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure Specialist
agents.description: Specialist in containerization, orchestration, cloud platforms, infrastructure as code, and edge computing

agents.name: Specialized Roles & Architecture Expert
agents.description: Expert in software architecture, system design, security, blockchain, management, and specialized technical roles

agents.name: Mobile & Game Development Specialist
agents.description: Specialist in mobile app development, game development, UX design, QA, and product management

agents.name: Foundational Skills & Tools Expert
agents.description: Expert in computer science fundamentals, version control, Linux, and shell scripting - the foundation for all specializations

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start guided learning path selection for your career goals

commands.name: browse-roadmap
commands.description: Explore and filter all 75+ available roadmaps by role, technology, or difficulty

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Evaluate your current knowledge level and get personalized learning recommendations

commands.name: compare-paths
commands.description: Compare learning paths between different roles to find the best fit for your goals
